name: Morgue
description: A facility for storing and examining the deceased; adventurers can investigate mysterious deaths, search for missing persons, or uncover evidence of foul play.
atmosphere: The morgue has a cold, clinical atmosphere with the scent of preserving chemicals and the weight of death hanging in the air. The sound of medical instruments and the quiet examination of the deceased creates a somber, investigative mood. The atmosphere crackles with the tension of uncovering secrets and the mysteries hidden in death.
